p: All experiments were performed with at least two biological duplicates. Data are shown with error bars indicating standard deviations. Studentâ€™s t-test was performed for all in vitro experiments as well as viral load quantitation from mice organs. Survival of mice was evaluated using Kaplan-Meier analysis. GraphPad Prism version 5.03 (GraphPad Software, USA) was used for statistical analyses with a P value of < 0.05 indicating significance.
